Name: Meghna
Review Text:
Great service, great food.
We came there on a weekday night and the waiter was very skilled and so so attentive. The food was delicious, we had the massala, and the price was appropriate ‚Ä¶

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Already 6 years in a row, every year on our anniversary on the 23rd of June we come here for dinner! Great food and service as always! Great value (and volume) for money, it's sooo much delicious food!

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Delicious Indian food in a small but nice restaurant on walking distance from Rembrandt Square. Very popular by locals.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Amazing food and service! Deserves more than 4,2 stars.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: This restaurant is a great place if u want to get ill treated and neglected over Europeans by an Indian restaurant. Would not recommend to other Indians, as this restaurant doesn't want you there based on the unwarmth and angry faces of ‚Ä¶

Name: Meghna
Review Text: The food was fresh and very tasty! The service was great and the price was very good too considering the location. Would highly recommend and will go back there when next in Amsterdam.

Name: Meghna
Review Text:
Meghna is a nice Indian restaurant with a friendly and professional staff.
The food was good and the quantity was good too, even if they are smaller than in many Indian restaurants I went to. However the nans and especially the cheese ‚Ä¶

Name: Meghna
Review Text: This place is definitely a bad choice to have Indian food. The quantity of the food is less with its over priced menu. The waiter and the manager didn‚Äôt treat us good. They just take your plate as soon as you complete without even asking your permission. Please look for other Indian restaurants.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Lovely little restaurant in Amsterdam. Had a range of curries including familiar ones and others. We finished all of our food and it was delicious. Waiters were friendly and the atmosphere was good.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Nice restaurant. Food is average and prices are a bit high but it is expected since its an Indian restaurant. Seats are very limited, the place is congested but i have no problem to go back there. I tried the king prawns with coconut cream, it was good üëçüèª

Name: Meghna
Review Text:
If you are an Indian, please don't go to this place. Its just a waste of time and money as per the food.
The service was good. The place is very small, so very congusted. The food didn't tasted near to Indian food.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Authentic Indian cooking, friendly service and very affordable. Meghana is family owned and definitely worth a visit if you are a fan of Indian cuisine.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: We took chicken Tandoori and Lamb meat. Excellent the food was really good. A little advice for the staff, please wait till the client finishes eating before clearing the table. That would be great üòâ

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Lovely family owned restaurant with super tasty food and the service is always with a smile. One of my favorite indian spots in the city center

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, pleasant music and nice staff. Only problem was the food which was really undercooked and we did not get enough rice for two people.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: If you like indian food this place is a must stop in Amsterdam! Its a lovely indian restaurant with very nice and friendly staff. I have eaten a lot of indian and this would be my 2nd best indian in my life. (Chicken makini) is the dish i bought

Name: Meghna
Review Text: A family favorite. Wonderful and authentic Indian food, and the staff is absolutely lovely! The chicken tika and panner kurma (vegetarian) are our favorites.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Nice, small and warm restaurant. The menu is Indian but the food is an European version. Quite good though. The service is nice and welcoming.

Name: Meghna
Review Text:
Nice and attentate staff, meals come quickly and taste quite well. Moderate prizes for Amsterdam.
You can sit inside only.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: We stopped by this restaurant for dinner. Tried lamb biryani and chicken curry. Loved it. Tasty and reasonable prices. Would definitely recommend.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Excellent food, affordable prices, good services.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: The staff was not friendly, i found a hair in my Sambousa, and although they did change it, however they tried to convince me that it was a skin of vegetables or whatever which is totally unprofessional and they didn't even try to apologies for that.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Great food! Really light. And great value. Hidden gem! And staff (Hussain) was very welcoming! Thanks guys.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Very good food. I had chicken tikka and the soup was very good too. Price is average like any other restaurants in that area.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Absolutely brilliant Indian food for a good price. If you love Indian food, this is a MUST. Stop reading this, go eat.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Decent food, just the chicken madras was below expectations. Service was really fast and the personnel friendly.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Amazing.. Rice pudding, sheek kebab and rogan josh is good.. Good value for money.. Highly recommended. I am an indian so trust me i know my indian food üòä

Name: Meghna
Review Text: The staff is kind and polite and the food is amazing! Great experience, highly recommended.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Fantastic Indian restaurant, great food for very reasonable prices. Friendly staff, perfect service.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Ordered meat biryani and it was pathetic. Don't know whether it's the same anywhere in Amsterdam. It was simply a fried rice mixed with meat.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Ok tasting food but different from a more traditional Indian restaurant. Service was not impressing

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Good authentic Indian food. Very kind staff. Not expensive. You will not regret.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Good food. Good service. However design could be updated, could be a little more clean I suppose.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Excellent authentic Indian food, very hospitable staff, highly recommend it

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Really poor Indian food. Even daal was horrible. One of the most horrible daal i ever had in 7 european countries.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Very cozy small restaurant. Great service and best food I have had for a long time!

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Food was very authentic. I would bring my mother (a great Indian cook) here and I know she would love it.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Great Indian food, my wife especially liked her king prawn meghna.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Good quality-price relation, kind staff. Simple and tasty Indian food.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Best indian food in amsterdam. I have tried so many dishes there and was never disappointed.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: The food was really good, the service was excellent, i just wish the were less formal in the effort to be polite

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Really awesome food and wait staff. Went there twice on my visit.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: The food was mediocre, lacked taste. I‚Äôve experienced much better Indian cuisine in Amsterdam

Name: Meghna
Review Text:
We love and enjoy that little place :)
Great food  nice people and atmosphere
Recommend it to every one!!!

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Friendly staff but food is average. There are better Indian restaurants in Amsterdam

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Food taste was good. Tried seekh kebab and chicken biryani.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Very friendly staff (almost both of them).

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Very good food. Prices are a bit on the high end.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Good indian food place. Prior reservation recommended.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: You're lucky I forget to eat at this restaurant the waiters are very European which means they leave you alone so go and enjoy the food

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Not very authentic Indian taste. But still good one.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: Delicious Indian - their chicken tikka masala is my favorite in town.

Name: Meghna
Review Text: This place gets five stars from their green sauce alone.

Name: Meghna

Name: Meghna
